title: Ribble drop 10.5kg carbon Endurance SL e Hero plus all-new aluminium e-road bike
content:
Ribble Cycles have added a Hero version of their Endurance SL e Carbon e-Road Bike, claiming to weigh a class-leading 10.5kg. With Shimano Ultegra Di2 and Ribble’s own LEVEL Super light EBM carbon wheels, the Hero build is almost 1 kg lighter than the Pro version. The British brand have also released the more affordable […]

The post Ribble drop 10.5kg carbon Endurance SL e Hero plus all-new aluminium e-road bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
